page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: At the recreation centre attached to the Joseph Whitaker School there are facilitiesfor 5 a side football,squash table tennis,gymnastics,badminton & weight training.Swimming will become available when the pool destroyed by fire in 1984 is rebuilt.Every summer there is a playscheme for children. There are football teams (including a ladies team) & bowling at the Miner's Welfare & a snooker hall on a site once occupied by a cinema.Gardening is a favourite activity of both the males & females.The chief male interest are football,golf,rallying & cricket. While women participate in traditonal activities of dressmaking,knitting & cookery,squash is becoming highly popular.Karate,swimming,weight training,geology & societies catering for special interests are also popular.
